overview: An expos√© into the world of online grooming and sextortion that is a present-day reality for one in seven children online. By unsealing the Homeland Security Investigations case of a Navy pilot with hundreds of victims, and in interviewing survivors and their parents, this true-crime piece reveals how and why this cybercrime against children is becoming pandemic.
tagline: Any kid online. Any time. Anywhere.
title: Sextortion: The Hidden Pandemic
